head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BENTON, SINGER, MARIANNE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BENTON, SINGER, MARIANNE

block.p: BENTON-SINGER-Marianne. On June 8th. Loving wife of Richard. Mother of Jason Zeif and Kate Singer. Friends may call at the Beecher Funeral Home, 418 Bedford Rd., Pleasantville, NY., Sunday 2-4 and 7-9pm. Funeral services Monday 10AM, Church of St. John and St. Mary, Chappaqua, NY. Her courage, wit and beauty inspired all who knew her.
